last_episode_to_air.name: S01E01: Namibia
last_episode_to_air.overview: She begins in the deserts of Namibia in south-west Africa, and discovers it home to an incredibly diverse range of life despite the high temperatures and lack of water. Davina goes head-to-head in a running race against a cheetah, camps in the sand dunes overnight and stays with San bushpeople to learn the skills that they have developed to survive.

name: Davina McCall: Life at the Extreme
original_name: Davina McCall: Life at the Extreme
overview: The TV presenter examines how animals survive in hostile environments by visiting some of the hottest, coldest, deepest and wettest places on Earth to experience life in extreme conditions.
